snippet.title: Aldo: Memory of the Kingdom - Second trailer | Steam
snippet.description:
Aldo: Memory of the Kingdom is a simple RPG.⚔️Find resources, level up, craft and get new equipment to defeat evil. Save people and build a settlement.🛖 

Demo available now on Steam!

Wishlist on Steam now, link in profile!

#gaming #indiedev #gamedev #madewithunity #indiegame #screenshotsaturday #game #trailer #steam
